code: import React from"react";import{useChannelStore}from"../stores/channels";import Label from"./Label";import List,{ListItem}from"./List";import styles from"./ChannelsList.module.css";var ChannelsList=function ChannelsList(){var channels=useChannelStore(function(state){return state.channels;});var activeChannelId=useChannelStore(function(state){return state.activeChannelId;});var setActiveChannelId=useChannelStore(function(state){return state.setActiveChannelId;});return React.createElement("div",{className:styles.wrapper},React.createElement(Label,null,"Channels"),React.createElement(List,null,channels.map(function(channel){return React.createElement(ListItem,{key:channel.id,isActive:activeChannelId===channel.id,onClick:function onClick(){return setActiveChannelId(channel.id);}},"#",channel.name);})),React.createElement("ul",{className:styles.channelList}));};export default ChannelsList;
